sections.name: Hero
sections.purpose: Immediate emotional connection + value proposition. Establish trust and curiosity within 3 seconds.
components: Animated SVG logo (tree growth on load)
Body copy (90 words) with subtle reveal

on_load: SVG logo path draws from 0-100% over 1800ms with ease-out
H1 words stagger in (100ms delay each) with fade + translateY
H2 fades in after H1 complete (200ms delay)
Body copy fades in 300ms after H2
CTAs fade + scale in together 400ms after body
animation_notes.parallax: Background subtle parallax shift on scroll (0.3 speed multiplier)

mobile_adaptations.typography: H1 scales to 85% size, maintain hierarchy
mobile_adaptations.animations: Reduce motion complexity, faster durations (60% of desktop)

admin_capabilities: Edit body copy (90 word limit with counter)

sections.name: Mission
sections.purpose: Articulate methodology and values. Build credibility through clarity and constraint-based thinking.

animation: H2 fades in + translateY(40px to 0) over 700ms ease-out
Body fades in 200ms after H2, same motion
Stagger paragraphs if multiple (150ms between)

mobile_adaptations.layout: Single column, increased line-height for readability

sections.name: Ecosystem Cards
sections.purpose: Present the three core products/initiatives as interconnected system. Clear value props with call-to-action.
components: 3 product cards in grid: ProScola, Khula Box, Rise Village
Each card: Title, Description, 'Learn more' CTA

animation: Cards stagger in (200ms delay between each)
Each card: fade + translateY(60px to 0) + scale(0.95 to 1) over 800ms ease-out
Hover: lift effect (translateY -8px) + shadow increase over 300ms ease-out

mobile_adaptations.hover: Tap to expand instead of hover lift

sections.name: Projects & Impact
sections.purpose: Demonstrate tangible outcomes. Show the technology in action with concrete examples.
components: Rich body copy with inline emphasis
CTA button 'See the system in action'

animation: H2 fades in with slide up (700ms)
Body content fades in sections (stagger 150ms)
Media/image reveals with scale 0.95 to 1.0 + fade (800ms)
CTA button fades + pops in last (300ms)

animation_notes.media_parallax: Image/video subtle parallax on scroll (0.2 speed)

sections.name: Personal Layer
sections.purpose: Humanize the brand. Show the person behind the systems through hobbies and philosophy.
components: Photo grid or gallery (motorcycles, cooking, photography)

animation: H2 and body standard fade + slide (700ms)
Photo grid items stagger reveal (100ms delay each)
Each photo: fade + scale 0.9 to 1.0
Hover: gentle scale 1.0 to 1.05 + brightness increase

sections.name: Consulting & Speaking
sections.purpose: Present services and availability. Clear CTAs for professional engagement.
components: Dual CTA buttons: 'Book a strategy call' + 'Request a keynote'

animation: Standard content reveal: H2 → body → CTAs
Dual CTAs appear together with slight stagger (100ms between)
Hover: buttons scale 1.0 to 1.03 + color shift

mobile_adaptations.layout: Stack CTAs vertically with full width

admin_capabilities: Edit button 1 label + URL (Calendly or form)

sections.name: Support a Village
sections.purpose: Social proof and direct contribution opportunity. Convert emotion into action.

animation: Section has warm gradient background that fades in
Content reveals with emphasis (slightly slower, 900ms)
CTA button prominent with pulse animation on appearance
Hover: strong lift + glow effect

sections.name: Journal Highlights
sections.purpose: Showcase thought leadership. Tease blog content to drive engagement and return visits.
components: Each card: Title, excerpt (1-2 lines), Read more link

animation: H2 standard reveal
Post cards stagger in (150ms delay)
Hover: card lifts + title color shift + arrow slide

admin_capabilities: For each post: title, excerpt, featured image, URL
Set number of posts to display (default 3)

sections.name: Contact
sections.purpose: Convert interest into conversation. Capture leads with low-friction form.
components: Contact form: Name, Email, Organization, Message (1200 char max)

animation: H2 and intro copy standard reveal
Form fields stagger in (80ms delay each)
Each field: fade + translateY(30px to 0)

form_interactions.submit: Button morphs to spinner, then success checkmark or error
form_interactions.success: Form fades out, success message fades in with confetti or subtle celebration

mobile_adaptations.layout: Full-width form fields, increased touch targets

sections.name: Footer
sections.purpose: Final brand reinforcement. Clean close with essential links and legal.

animation: Quote fades in with subtle scale
Social icons stagger in (50ms delay)
Hover: icons scale + color shift

sequence: Navigation fades in (400ms) after logo 50% complete
Hero content staggers in as described above

reduced_motion.fallback: Simple fades only, no transforms or complex animations
